Question.Subject: What are some virtual worlds that you don't have to download, that are like Planet Cazmo?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hi there, there are many virtual worlds' reviews and information on the below website. This site reviewed almost all of the popular virtual worlds that are available on the Internet. I am sure you can find one that suits you there. Happy surfing. =)
http://www.virtualworldsforkids.info
Oh yes, please do not be mislead by the web address name because you can definitely find much more than just for kids!
